devdoc.details: An smart contract for staking any ERC20 token

addReward(uint256).details: Increasing reward treasury by transferring tokens to the contract

params._amount: | the amount of tokens to be transferred to the contract

params._address: | the address to be added to blacklist

claimReward(uint256,address).details: Withdraws specified amount of staked amount, transfer tokens to sender

params._amount: | the amount of token to withdraw in token unit e.g. 200 * 10**18
params._to: | the address to which reward will be transferred

constructor.details: Constructor sets the ERC20 token that can be used for staking

distributeReward().details: Distributes rewards collected in reward treasury between eligible stakers

getMyStakedAmount(uint256).details: Gets staker staked amont at specified time

params.at: | the time to return staked amount at

getMyStakingProfit().details: Get the staker distributed profit from staking tokens

getMyStakingTimeElapsed().details: Gets staker staking time elapsed in seconds

getMyStakingTotalProfit().details: Get the staker distributed profit from staking tokens

getMyStakingValidity().details: Gets the validity status of the staking.

getTotalRates().details: Calculates total rates of eligible stakers

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._address: | the address to be added to blacklist

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setMinStakingAmount(uint256).details: Sets the minimum amount a staker is allowed to satke

params._minStakingAmount: | the amount in token unit e.g. 500 * 10**18

setRollingDay(uint256).details: Sets rolling day that is used to calculate average

params._rollingDay: | the rolling day in seconds e.g. 7 * 24 * 60 * 60 = 604800 seconds

stake(uint256).details: Stakes tokens & transfers them to the contract

params._amount: | the amount of tokens to be staked

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unstake(uint256).details: Withdraws specified amount of staked amount, transfer tokens to sender

params._amount: | the amount of token to withdraw in token unit e.g. 200 * 10**18
